placeholders.main_menu: Choose an action or type a command...

welcome: Welcome to Dream Diary Bot! This bot helps you keep a personal dream journal. Record your dreams, add tags and notes, and search through them later. Use the menu buttons below or type /help for commands.
help: Dream Diary Bot - your personal dream journal. Menu buttons: - New dream - Create a new dream entry - My dreams - View your dreams list - Search - Search dreams by keywords - Export - Export all dreams to a text file - Help - Show this help message Commands: /new - Create a new dream entry /list - View your dreams (with pagination) /search <query> - Search dreams by keywords /view <id> - View a specific dream /edit <id> - Edit a dream entry /delete <id> - Delete a dream entry /export - Export all dreams to a text file /language - Change language /cancel - Cancel current operation /help - Show this help message Dream entry structure: - Title (required) - Description - Tags (comma-separated keywords) - Notes (personal comments) - Date (defaults to today)
